title: #1493 I Like Soft Serve Yogurt
itunes:title: #1493 I Like Soft Serve Yogurt
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the recent controversy surrounding Dave Chappelle and Drew's delight that despite that he is still able to tour and fill arenas. Before turning to the phones, Adam pays off a tease from the last show and plays a clip of Chicago mayor Lori Lightfoot addressing the controversy surrounding her getting a haircut mid-pandemic. Upon getting to the phones they are met by a caller who is unvaccinated and facing a 40% jump in his insurance costs as a result. They also discuss the Alec Baldwin tragedy and speak to a caller who is still struggling after a breakup and looking for advice.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
XChairDrew.com
GetRoman.com/ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
LiveXLive.com/ADAMandDREW
